mapper.insert: insert into teacher (id, pwd, name, age, sex, email, address, phone, mPhone) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{mPhone})
mapper.update: update teacher set name=#{name}, age=#{age}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, mPhone=#{mPhone} where tno = #{tno}
mapper.select: select * from teacher order by tno desc, regdate desc
